text: ai logon! apane rab ka dar rakho aur us din se daro jab na koee baap apanee aulaad kee or se badala dega aur na koee aulaad hee apane baap kee or se badala denevaalee hogee. nishchay hee allaah ka vaada sachcha hai. atah saansaarik jeevan kadaapi tumhen dhokhe mein na daale. aur na allaah ke vishay mein vah dhokhebaaz tumhen dhokhen mein daale
